content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position 0)
- Boiler (position 1)
- Offshore pump (position 2)

### Copper plate mine at position(3)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 3) and a furnace at position(4)
- Burner mining drill (position 5) and a furnace at position(6)
- Burner mining drill (position 7) and a furnace at position(8)

### Copper cable factory at position(9)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(10) and inserter at position(11) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 12) that connects the furnace at position 4 to assembling machine at position(10)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the items you are trying to craft. For instance, iron plates must be smelted in a furnace.
